description:
This task involves updating our current calendar with the dates/times for events that we’ve participated in the past as well as researching and adding new events. It's centered around HFOSS-related events such as OSCON, ApacheCon, etc. Work to Do. Update the sheet here ( https://goo.gl/gPqHhj )

Please also add these items to the Mifos Community Calendar at http://mifos.org/resources/community/calendar/. It's a Google Calendar so you'll need to request access to it when you've claimed the task.
name: Update Events On Mifos Calendar for HFOSS Events
